# Setup

## Installing Git

To install on Windows, download the executable from [here](https://git-scm.com/).

## Version

If you have Git installed on your computer then the following command will
return the version number you have installed.

```bash
git version
## git version 2.45.0.windows.1
```

::: {.callout-note}
Alternatively you can use `git -v` or `git --version`.
:::
